activities.name: Move Articles CSV to Articles folder

source.sqlReaderQuery:
delete from GTFS
SELECT TOP(10) Agencies.Agency_name,
      10 AS Agency_id,
      Agencies.Agency_url,
      Agencies.Agency_timezone,
      Agencies.Agency_lang,
      Agencies.Agency_phone,
	  Route.Route_id,
	  Route.Route_short_name,
	  Route.Route_long_name,
	  Route.Route_desc,
	  10 AS Route_type,
	  Route.Route_url,
	  trip.Trip_id,
	  CONVERT(int, trip.Trip_short_name) AS Trip_short_name,
	  10 AS Direction_id,
	  trip.Block_id,
	  Cal.Service_id,	  
          case when Cal.Monday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Monday,   
		  case when Cal.Tuesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Tuesday, 
		  case when Cal.Wednesday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Wednesday, 
		  case when Cal.Thursday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Thursday, 
		 case when Cal.Friday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Friday, 
		  case when Cal.Saturday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Saturday, 
		 case when Cal.Sunday = '0' 
            then 0 
            else 1 
          end as Sunday, 
	  Cal.Start_date,
	  Cal.End_date,
	  CalDate.Date,
	  10 AS Exception_type,
	  Shape.shape_id,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lat) AS shape_pt_lat,
	  CONVERT(DOUBLE PRECISION, Shape.shape_pt_lon) AS shape_pt_lon,
	  CONVERT(int, Shape.shape_pt_sequence) AS shape_pt_sequence,
	  NEWID() as GuId
  FROM [Routes] Route
  LEFT JOIN [Agency] Agencies
    ON Route.Agency_id = Agencies.Agency_id	
	JOIN [Trips] trip
    ON Route.Route_id = trip.Route_id
	JOIN [CalendarUpdate] Cal
    ON Cal.Service_id=trip.Service_id
	JOIN [calendar_dates_update] CalDate
	 ON Cal.Service_id=CalDate.Service_id
	JOIN [Shapes] Shape
    ON Shape.shape_id = trip.Shape_id
  ORDER by Agencies.Agency_id

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to CRM
Set variable of zip file name
Set variable of zip folder name

dependsOn.activity: Set variable of zip file name
Set variable of zip folder name

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Type_equipement as integer,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Name as string,
		Guid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(length(rtrim(Code_segment))==2,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(lengthcheck, goodrows)
ConditionalSplit1@lengthcheck derive(Date = currentDate(),
		System = "Atlas",
		FileName = "Merge.csv",
		Success = "No") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		file_name as string,
		success as string,
		date as date,
		system as string,
		record_detail as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		file_name = FileName,
		success = Success,
		date = Date,
		system = System,
		record_detail = Guid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Code_segment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dataflowSource
dataflowSource split(like(Code_segment,'000%'),
	like(Code_segment,'005%'),
	like(Code_segment,'004%'),
	like(Code_segment,'003%'),
	like(Code_segment,'002%'),
	like(Code_segment,'001%'),
	disjoint: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Segment0, Segment5, Segment4, Segment3, Segment2, Segment1, Others)
ConditionalSplit@Segment0 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg0
ConditionalSplit@Segment1 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = currentUTC(),
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg1
ConditionalSplit@Segment2 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = currentUTC(),
		Column14 = currentUTC(),
		Column15 = split(Code_segment,';')[15],
		Column16 = split(Code_segment,';')[16],
		Column17 = split(Code_segment,';')[17],
		Column18 = split(Code_segment,';')[18],
		Column19 = split(Code_segment,';')[19],
		Column20 = split(Code_segment,';')[20],
		Column21 = split(Code_segment,';')[21],
		Column22 = split(Code_segment,';')[22],
		Column23 = split(Code_segment,';')[23],
		Column24 = split(Code_segment,';')[24],
		Column25 = split(Code_segment,';')[25],
		Column26 = split(Code_segment,';')[26],
		Column27 = split(Code_segment,';')[27],
		Column28 = split(Code_segment,';')[28],
		Column29 = split(Code_segment,';')[29],
		Column30 = split(Code_segment,';')[30]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg2
ConditionalSplit@Segment3 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg3
ConditionalSplit@Segment5 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = currentUTC(),
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = split(Code_segment,';')[13]) ~> DerivedColumnseg5
ConditionalSplit@Segment4 derive(Column1 = split(Code_segment,';')[1],
		Column2 = split(Code_segment,';')[2],
		Column3 = split(Code_segment,';')[3],
		Column4 = split(Code_segment,';')[4],
		Column5 = split(Code_segment,';')[5],
		Column6 = split(Code_segment,';')[6],
		Column7 = split(Code_segment,';')[7],
		Column8 = split(Code_segment,';')[8],
		Column9 = split(Code_segment,';')[9],
		Column10 = split(Code_segment,';')[10],
		Column11 = split(Code_segment,';')[11],
		Column12 = split(Code_segment,';')[12],
		Column13 = split(Code_segment,';')[13],
		Column14 = split(Code_segment,';')[14],
		Column15 = currentUTC(),
		Column16 = split(Code_segment,';')[16]) ~> DerivedColumnSeg4
DerivedColumnSeg0 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Plateforme as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Plateforme = Column2
	)) ~> SQLSegment0
DerivedColumnSeg1 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Type_equipement as string,
		Num_syst_emetteur as string,
		CEB as string,
		Num_serie as string,

	),

	),

DerivedColumnSeg2 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,

		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_oper_vente as string,
		Type_mvt as string,
		Categ_produit as string,

		Num_elt_commande = Column29,
		Type_elt_commande = Column30
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

DerivedColumnSeg3 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Comm_struct as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		Code_moyen_paiement = Column5,
		Sens_paiement = Column6,
		Montant = Column7,
		Id_entreprise = Column8,
		Comm_struct = Column9
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment3
DerivedColumnSeg4 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,

		Mode_TPV as string,
		Brand_id as string,
		Machine_number as string,
		Pdv_clct_nr as string,
		Pdv_gen_tx_nb as string,
		Transaction_identifier as string,

		Auth_code as string

	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		Code_moyen_paiement = Column5,
		Sens_paiement = Column6,
		Montant = Column7,
		Hardware_type = Column8,
		Mode_TPV = Column9,
		Brand_id = Column10,
		Machine_number = Column11,
		Pdv_clct_nr = Column12,
		Pdv_gen_tx_nb = Column13,
		Transaction_identifier = Column14,
		Dateh_tpe = Column15,
		Auth_code = Column16
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment4
DerivedColumnseg5 sink(input(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		TransactionReference as string,
		TransactionDateTime as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		StatementReference as string,
		PaymentMeanBrand as string,
		ValueDate as timestamp,
		Amount as double,
		AuthorizationId as string,
		MerchantId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Code_segment = Column1,
		Poste_segment = Column2,
		Id_transaction = Column3,
		Id_paiement = Column4,
		TransactionReference = Column5,
		TransactionDateTime = Column6,
		Sens_paiement = Column7,
		StatementReference = Column8,
		PaymentMeanBrand = Column9,
		ValueDate = Column10,
		Amount = Column11,
		AuthorizationId = Column12,
		MerchantId = Column13
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SQLSegment5

source(output(
		ID as string,
		{N° Reseau} as string,
		{Libelle Reseau Produit} as string,
		{N° Produit} as string,
		{Libelle long Produit} as string,
		{DDV Produit} as string,
		{DEV Produit} as string,
		{Supprimé ?} as string,
		{Date Suppression} as string,
		{Libellé du Type de support} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceproducts
sourceproducts derive(DDV_Product = iif(length({DDV Produit})==10,toDate(substring({DDV Produit},7,4)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},4,2)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},1,2)),toDate(substring({DDV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DDV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DDV Produit},1,1))),
		DEV_Product = iif(length({DEV Produit})==10,toDate(substring({DEV Produit},7,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},4,2)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},1,2)),toDate(substring({DEV Produit},6,4)+"-"+substring({DEV Produit},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({DEV Produit},1,1))),
		{Supprimé} = iif({Supprimé ?}=='N',0,1),
		{Date Suppression} = iif(length({Date Suppression})==10,toDate(substring({Date Suppression},7,4)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},4,2)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},1,2)),toDate(substring({Date Suppression},6,4)+"-"+substring({Date Suppression},3,2)+"-"+"0"+substring({Date Suppression},1,1))),
		supporttypelabel = case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Carte sans contact",899240000, case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Ticket sans contact", 899240001, case({Libellé du Type de support}=="Ticket papier", 899240002,899240003))),
		Unit_Group = "655ae15c-f836-4690-b39a-b2f3828916d5",
		Price_List = "fd17b017-0ad3-ea11-a812-000d3aba7e84",
		Unit = "9cbc6280-1e90-4492-9bfc-71d1d83c1c5a") ~> DerivedColumnTypeConvertions

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Top(100)
     E003.Code_segment
    ,E003.Poste_segment
    ,E003.Id_transaction
    ,E001.Num_serie
    ,E002.Id_entreprise
    ,E003.Id_paiement
    ,E003.Code_moyen_paiement
    ,E003.Sens_paiement
    ,E003.Montant
    ,10 AS Type_Eqiupment
    ,E001.Date_ope
    ,E000.Plateforme
	,NEWID() AS Unique_Id
  FROM [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_001] E001
  LEFT JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_002] E002
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E002.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_003] E003
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E003.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_000] E000
    ON E000.Code_segment = '000'
  ORDER by E001.id_transaction

activities.name: Copy SQL Join to CODA Integration

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
NEWID() AS GUID,
Zero.RecordIdentification AS Zero_RecordIdentification,
Zero.CreationDate AS Zero_CreationDate,
Zero.BankIdentificationNumber AS Zero_BankIdentificationNumber,
Zero.ApplicationCode AS Zero_ApplicationCode,
Zero.Duplicate AS Zero_Duplicate,
Zero.FileReference AS Zero_FileReference,
Zero.NameAddressee AS Zero_NameAddressee,
Zero.BIC AS Zero_BIC,
Zero.IdentificationNumberofBelgium AS Zero_IdentificationNumberofBelgium,
Zero.CodeSeperateApplication AS Zero_CodeSeperateApplication,
Zero.TransactionReferrence AS Zero_TransactionReferrence,
Zero.RelatedReferrence AS Zero_RelatedReferrence,
One.RegistrationID AS One_RegistrationId,
case One.BankAccountType
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     when '2' then 899240002
     when '3' then 899240003
     end AS One_BankAccountType,
One.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS One_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
One.Accountnumber AS One_Accountnumber,
case One.Oldbalance
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS One_Oldbalance,
One.Oldpay AS One_Oldpay,
One.Dateofoldbalance AS One_Dateofoldbalance,
One.Accountholdername AS One_Accountholdername,
One.Accounttagged AS One_Accounttagged,
One.Sequencenumberofthecodified AS One_Sequencenumberofthecodified,
Four.RegistrationID AS Four_RegistrationID,
Four.Textofthefreemessage AS Four_Textofthefreemessage,
Eight.RegistrationID AS Eight_RegistrationId,
Eight.Sequencenumber AS Eight_Sequencenumber,
Eight.Accountnumber AS Eight_Accountnumber,
case Eight.SignCode
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS Eight_SignCode,
Eight.NewBalance AS Eight_NewBalance ,
Eight.Dateofnewbalance AS Eight_Dateofnewbalance,
Nine.RegistrationID AS Nine_RegistrationId,
Nine.Numberofrecords AS Nine_Numberofrecords,
Nine.DebitRevenue AS Nine_DebitRevenue,
Nine.CreditSales AS Nine_CreditSales
from [dbo].[CODA-0] Zero
left join [dbo].[CODA-1] One on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[CODA-4] Four on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[CODA-8] Eight on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[CODA-9] Nine on 1=1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select
NEWID() AS GUID,
'CODA' AS Data_Source,
Zero.FileReference AS Zero_FileReference,
CODA.GUID AS CODA_Guid,
TwoOne.RegistrationID AS TwoOne_RegistrationId,
TwoOne.Sequencenumber AS TwoOne_Sequencenumber,
TwoOne.Retailnumber AS TwoOne_Retailnumber,
TwoOne.bankreferencenumber AS TwoOne_bankreferencenumber,
case TwoOne.Movementsign
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS TwoOne_Movementsign,
TwoOne.Amount AS TwoOne_Amount,
TwoOne.Valuedate AS TwoOne_Valuedate,
TwoOne.OperationCode AS TwoOne_OperationCode,
case TwoOne.communicationtype
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS TwoOne_communicationtype,
TwoOne.Communicationzone AS TwoOne_Communicationzone,
TwoOne.Accountdate AS TwoOne_Accountdate,
TwoOne.Sequencenumberofpaperaccount AS TwoOne_Sequencenumberofpaperaccount,
TwoOne.Codeglobalization AS TwoOne_Codeglobalization,
TwoTwo.RegistrationID AS TwoTwo_RegistrationId,
TwoTwo.Communication AS TwoTwo_Communication,
TwoTwo.Customerreference AS TwoTwo_Customerreference,
TwoTwo.BIC AS TwoTwo_BIC,
case TwoTwo.Transactiontype
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
	 when '2' then 899240002
     when '3' then 899240003
	 when '4' then 899240004
     end AS TwoTwo_Transactiontype,
TwoTwo.ISOCode AS TwoTwo_ISOCode,
TwoTwo.CategoryPurpose AS TwoTwo_CategoryPurpose,
TwoTwo.Purpose AS TwoTwo_Purpose,
TwoThree.RegistrationID AS TwoThree_RegistrationId,
TwoThree.Counterpartyaccountnumber AS TwoThree_Counterpartyaccountnumber,
TwoThree.Nameofcounterparty AS TwoThree_Nameofcounterparty,
TwoThree.Communication AS TwoThree_Communication,
ThreeOne.RegistrationID AS ThreeOne_RegistrationId,
ThreeOne.AdditionalInformation AS ThreeOne_AdditionalInformation,
ThreeOne.OperationCode AS ThreeOne_OperationCode,
case ThreeOne.CommunicationCode
     when '0' then 899240000
     when '1' then 899240001
     end AS ThreeOne_CommunicationCode,
ThreeOne.Communication AS ThreeOne_Communication,
ThreeTwo.RegistrationID AS ThreeTwo_RegistrationId,
ThreeTwo.Communication AS ThreeTwo_Communication,
ThreeThree.RegistrationID AS ThreeThree_RegistrationId,
ThreeThree.Communication AS ThreeThree_Communication 
from [dbo].[CODA-21] TwoOne
left join [dbo].[CODA-22] TwoTwo on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = TwoTwo.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-23] TwoThree on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = TwoThree.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-31] ThreeOne on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeOne.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-32] ThreeTwo on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeTwo.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-33] ThreeThree on TwoOne.[Sequencenumber] = ThreeThree.[Sequencenumber]
left join [dbo].[CODA-0]  Zero       on 1=1 
left join [dbo].[CODAIntegration]  CODA  on 1=1
